meta.jobDescription: Software developer role, full-stack (MERN + PHP) and AI/ML tasks. Remote, full-time. Includes backend services, API design, responsive frontend, AI/ML model integration, optimization, debugging, collaboration.

keyRequirements: Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3
Experience with REST APIs and databases
Familiar with Git-based workflows and CI/CD tools
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and data science
Experience building and deploying ML models in production
Proficient with data handling libraries (e.g., NumPy, Pandas)
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) is a plus
software-developer-addis-ababa.narrative: Natinael Samuel is an experienced software developer and AI/ML practitioner with strong full-stack expertise in MERN + PHP technologies. He has built and maintained dynamic web applications, APIs, and backend services, ensuring performance, scalability, and security. With solid proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and database management, he can seamlessly integrate AI/ML models into web platforms. Natinael is adept at collaboration with UI/UX teams, debugging complex systems, and optimizing applications. His experience with REST APIs, CI/CD workflows, and cloud platforms ensures smooth deployment and production readiness. Hiring Natinael guarantees a high-alignment match with your technical requirements and project goals.

skills.evidence: Built multiple MERN stack web applications and integrated PHP backend modules.
Used extensively in frontend and full-stack projects.
Designed responsive UI/UX in multiple web applications.
Developed backend APIs for web apps and integrated third-party services.
Built AI/ML modules for video surveillance and other SaaS applications.

projectHighlights.relevance: Integrated real-time AI/ML video monitoring into a scalable SaaS platform.
Developed full-stack healthcare web application with real-time analytics and backend services.

experienceHighlights.relevance: Led development of multiple web applications, managing frontend and backend integration.
Designed and deployed AI/ML models for real-time monitoring and prediction tasks.

educationFit.evidence: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering aligns with the requirement.

meta.jobDescription: Frontend Developer role focusing on React.js, TypeScript, React Native, Next.js, and related technologies. Involves building responsive web and mobile applications, UI/UX design, state management, API integration, performance optimization, and collaboration with teams.

keyRequirements: Proficiency in React.js, TypeScript, Next.js, React Native
Experience with UI/UX design and state management (Redux)
Knowledge of Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
Frontend frameworks: React, Vue.js, Angular (React required)
Performance optimization, unit testing, CI/CD, containerization
Familiarity with Linux/Windows OS, security measures, data protection
frontend-developer-addis-ababa102.narrative: Natinael Samuel is a versatile frontend and full-stack developer with strong expertise in React.js, TypeScript, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. He has delivered production-ready web and mobile applications, focusing on responsive design, performance optimization, and seamless API integration. His projects such as MedHub Ethiopia and WZSIT WebApp demonstrate his ability to design scalable UIs, integrate backend services, and apply modern state management with Redux. With proven skills in debugging, testing, and cross-functional collaboration, Natinael is an excellent fit for this Frontend Developer internship.

versatile-application-developer-remote10.narrative: Natinael Samuel is a full-stack developer and AI enthusiast with strong expertise in the MERN stack, PHP, and AI/ML development. He has delivered production-ready applications such as MedHub Ethiopia, MyFayda eKYC, and Wa-Leba AI Surveillance, covering frontend, backend, and cloud deployment. He has applied AI coding tools and frameworks in real-world projects, and deployed applications using Vercel, Firebase, and AWS. Natinael also brings a unique edge with a Marketing Management degree in progress and experience as a startup founder (Diguwa-Store), giving him practical exposure to marketing, growth strategies, and product launches.

With proven use of Git, REST APIs, JWT/OAuth, CI/CD, and AI-assisted coding tools, Natinael can accelerate workflows and improve code quality. While he has exposure to PostgreSQL, GraphQL, Docker, AWS, and DevOps concepts, he is eager to strengthen these areas. Combined with Agile teamwork experience and a Software Engineering degree, Natinael aligns well with the core role requirements.

His experience leading backend development and applying secure coding practices positions him as a strong candidate for this Backend Developer role.

He has built production-ready platforms such as MedHub Ethiopia and MyFayda eKYC, demonstrating skills in API integration, deployment, and UI/UX design. While his backend expertise is primarily with Node.js and MongoDB, he has exposure-level familiarity with Laravel, PHP, and MySQL, and is eager to strengthen his proficiency in these frameworks. His deployment experience with Netlify, Vercel, and server-side setups, combined with his exposure to AWS and CI/CD workflows, makes him a strong candidate ready to grow further in this role.

With solid manual QA and API-testing experience from internships, Natinael is well-positioned to contribute as a Junior Backend Developer while supporting QA processes and growing into automated testing frameworks.
